    public class GameBoard
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.io.Serializable
    Creating the GameBoard object needed to play this game

      • attack

        public Cell attack(Cell cellWithUnitAtacking,
          Cell cellWithUnitBeingAttacked)
        Attack method for two cells containing units being given: returns the cell of unitBeingAttacked to the GUI, that updates the unit info in that cell:

      • CheckgameOverBooleanVersion

        public boolean CheckgameOverBooleanVersion(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> units)
        Checks to see if the game is over by looking at player1Untis List, and player2Units List to see if either one of them is empty, this verison returns a boolean, we dont know who lost:
        Parameters:
        units - If any ArrayList given (assumed to be from a player) isEmpty, game is over
        Returns:
        true is ArrayList given is empty, then game is over, else false
